All of the materials from this workshop are freely available. We suggest you work through them in order (see the [Schedule](schedule.qmd) for the order in which materials were presented at the pre-ASTMH workshop).

## List of all the tutorials 

- Activity 1: [Sampling from a population](https://mms-sdworkshop.shinyapps.io/module1_sampling_interactive/)
- Activity 2: [Sample size calculation based on margin of error](https://mms-sdworkshop.shinyapps.io/activity2_MOE_interactive/)
- Activity 3: [Hypothesis testing and power](https://mms-sdworkshop.shinyapps.io/activity3_power_interactive/)
- Activity 4: [Dealing with overdispersion in multi-cluster studies](https://mms-sdworkshop.shinyapps.io/activity4_multicluster_interactive/)
- Activity 5: [The DRpower tool](https://mms-sdworkshop.shinyapps.io/module5_DRpower_interactive/)
- Activity 6: [Designing a study for multiple end-points](tutorials/module6/module6_scenarios.Rmd)
